execution_plan.description: Find usernames of users who participate in chats whose name or description mentions 'technical' from the app_chat database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT users.username AS s1__username FROM users JOIN chat_members ON chat_members.user_id = users.id JOIN chats ON chats.id = chat_members.chat_id WHERE lower(chats.name) LIKE '%technical%' OR lower(chats.description) LIKE '%technical%';

execution_plan.description: Return usernames from the main app database that have posts, restricted to usernames found in step 1 (users who participate in technical chats).
execution_plan.query: SELECT users.username AS s2__username FROM users JOIN posts ON posts.user_id = users.id WHERE users.username IN ($step1.s1__username);
